Name: Organization leadership
Description: A date-mediated compound-value type that holds information about the relationship between leaders of organizations and the roles and titles they've held at those organizations. Leadership roles are typically executive level roles/titles such as CEO, president, vice-president, director, etc.

Properties.Name: From
Properties.Description: Starting date for this person's leadership relationship with the organization for this role.

Properties.Name: Organization
Properties.Description: The organization for which this person has held a leadership role.

Properties.Name: Person
Properties.Description: The person who has held a leadership role for this organization. Non-consecutive leadership roles should be entered separately. Similarly, leadership roles with different titles should also be entered separately.

Properties.Name: Role
Properties.Description: The leadership role this person has held for this organization.

Properties.Name: Title
Properties.Description: The title given for this leadership role for this organization. If the title associated for this person in a leadership relationship with this organization changes a new leadership relationship should be created.

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: Ending date for this person's leadership relationship with the organization for this role.
